sentences.en: By subjects : philology , as in mathematics, Luo Wu Xue, Zhizhi school.
sentences.cn: 所定课目有: 语文学 、 象数学 、 格物学 、 致知学.

sentences.en: During the Qing Dynasty, philology was a mere handmaid of classical studies.
sentences.cn: 语言文字学在清代还只是经学的附庸.

sentences.en: Gujin Zi and interchangeability of Chinese characters are two adequate terms in the traditional philology.
sentences.cn: 古今字和通假字,一直是传统语言文字学两个界限不清的术语.

sentences.en: His major interests and main scholarship were on philology.
sentences.cn: 他治经治学的重点和主要学术成就体现在朴学方面,他的经学思想则倾向于公羊学.

sentences.en: I don't know the philology side, I don't know what disables to metaphysical questions.
sentences.cn: 我不知道者从语言学上来说对不对，我也不懂从形而上学角度看,有什么问题。

sentences.en: I knew that I wanted to combine Semitic Philology and Modern Linguistics and rigorous manner.
sentences.cn: 我的期待目标是透过严谨的治学方式,结合闪语文献学和现在语言学.

sentences.en: In his works of literature and philology, there are many quotations from The Book of Changes.
sentences.cn: 在鲁迅有关文学、字学的著作中, 多处征引《周易》的文字,以《周易》立论.

sentences.en: Professor Smith is recognized to be one of the great scholars in English philology.
sentences.cn: 史密斯教授被公认为是了不起的英语语言学学者之一。

sentences.en: Reviewing philology phonology dialectology and lexis studying history, which aiming at the annotation of Lushi - chunqiu's. "
sentences.cn: 回顾了文献学、音韵学、方言学及词汇训诂学等学科有关高诱《吕氏春秋注 》 的研究历史.

sentences.en: Semiotics is a subject forming in 20 th century and has much relation with constructivism and philology.
sentences.cn: 符号学是一门二十世纪新兴的学科,与语言学与结构主义的发展有着密切的关系.

trans.tran_en: the study of words and of the way words and languages develop
